description: A translation is a translated message in a single language for a string property/field of any Mapeo record type
title: translation

docId.description: hex-encoded id of the element that this observation references

versionId.description: core discovery id (hex-encoded 32-byte buffer) and core index number, separated by '/'

type.description: type of the element that this translation references

propertyRef.description: identifier for translated field/property in dot-prop notation

regionCode.description: two-letter country code from ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 or a three-digit code from UN M.49 for geographical regions
